resp.text:
James,

Thank you for your kind review.

Sincerely,
Mark Berthiaume - Manager

name: William McGroarty
text: The employees are always friendly and willing to help with whatever you need!

name: Paul Emanuel
text: Always a quick in and quick out.

name: Kyle Taylor
text: These people are genuinely nice and helpful. I have a mail box there and stop in often. Always smiling faces. No one is perfect but I feel comfortable working with this team.

resp.text:
Thank you for the kind review.

Mark Berthiaume - Manager

name: Lori O'Keefe
text: I recently had worked with the UPS store here in Homewood, AL on a project with a client of mine. They did such an excellent job helping us get organized for a big home show at the very last minute. I can't say enough great things about their care and attention to their customers and local businesses they work with. I would highly recommend using them for any of your projects, mailing or shipping needs.

name: Garrett Hester
text: I've never had a bad experience at this place. The staff has a good customer service attitude, they're always prompt to provide assistance, and I never feel like I'm a bother to them. They seem genuinely eager to help. Recommended.

name: Renee Page
text: No consideration for customers.  Not well managed.  Disrespectful and inefficient.

resp.text:
Thank you for your review.  Without specifics it is hard to respond to see how we could have made your visit more efficient and acceptable.

Sincerely,
Mark Berthiaume
Manager

name: Juan
text: Got a weird racist vibe from here. I was waiting for like 5 min in the front of the store (store was empty) to drop a few boxes then a worker walked by and looked me dead in the eye and said nothing just walked to the back of the store.(probably cuz I was speaking Spanish lol )  If it wasn’t for the young man that works in front I would never come back.. too bad he wasn’t there today. He’s the only reason I gave this review 2 stars

resp.text:
Juan,
I'm sorry you had a bad experience at our store.  We do our best to make every customer's experience a good one.   I can assure you there is no problem with you speaking Spanish.  We do our best to have an employee working who can speak Spanish as much as possible, as we have a number of customers who would prefer to complete their transaction in Spanish.
Sincerley,
Mark Berthiaume - Manager

name: Frank Burchfield
text: This place just tried to charge me $5 to run off 1 black and white piece of paper. My biggest mistake was coming period. This is exactly why UPS continues to be a joke!

resp.text:
Mr. Burchfield:  I'm sorry your experience did not meet your expectations.  When you were in and said you wanted to email us a document to print, I asked how many pages (1) and if it was black and white (yes).  I offered you a $2 alternative to the email, which was to log on to our wi-fi, and print the document to our wi-fi printer instead of the $5 email charge.

Sincerley,
Mark Berthiaume
Manager

name: Brielle Deloris
text: When I entered the facility the staff seemed apprehensive to help customers who walked through the doors. I sent a package overnight for next day delivery and my package was never sent from this specific location although this is the location I took my package too. I paid for overnight service for something that was never sent and I had to open and investigation for my package. I’m disappointed in my first and last experience with UPS. I’ll stick to FEDEX.

resp.text:
I don't show a shipment from our UPS Store with the name of Brielle Deloris.  Could you supply me with the tracking number so I can research the shipment in question.  There is one NDA shipment sent recently that a customer came into our store to ask some questions about.  I'm not sure if that is the shipment you are referencing or not, but I would be glad to have a dialogue with you regarding your shipment.
Sincerely,
Mark Berthiaume - Manager

name: David Rogers
text: They provide great service for printing. I send them a file that I need 100 copies printed and cut and almost always they are done by the end of the business day. Absolutely great service.

name: Isabel Medina
text: Ive printed a lot of my restaurant's manus and promotions with this store. They always do a great job!

name: Londa Wren
text: Great staff always friendly!!

name: Brennen Privett
text:
This was the worst experience I think I've ever had in a store. The staff was horrible. I asked a simple question and the guy said I'll go get it from the back. I sat at the front for 45 minutes. Not only that but the girl at the online pickup/print area literally cussed out a customer. He left. Not to mention how messy and dirty the place is.

(Edit) When I found the guy he apologized. I understand that people can forget things. 1star to 2 stars. (Because that chick was super rude and like I said she cussed a customer out)

name: Messy Potamia
text: Okay.  Heavy rains last night. Wonder if he spent the night in their men's restroom handicapped stall.

name: patricia mccoy
text: Very rude and unprofessional person that works up front I would gladly take his job and I could guarantee that every customer that came through there would be helped and smiling when they walked out. I will never go back and I bought nothing.

resp.text:
Hi Patricia:

Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback. I am so sorry to hear we let you down. This is not the experience we want for our customers. We will research this immediately.

Would you please be so kind to send an email to socialmedia.service@officedepot.com with your best contact email and phone number, and a short recap similar to below? Please include the store #2564 in the subject line.

We are here to help!

Chloe :)

name: Stephanie Mims
text: Last 2 times I been in this store, staff was non existent. Couldn’t find anybody to help. Finally found one guy that didn’t offer that much help or knowledge. Went back in to return an item and cashier had an attitude for no reason. Store was messy and disorganized. Went down to Staples and had an awesome experience. Also spent $200+ there. So sorry about y’all’s luck. I won’t be back to this location.

resp.text: Hello Stephanie,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback. I am so sorry to hear we let you down. This is not the experience we want our Customers to have and we want to investigate this immediately. I have sent this to the Field Management Team responsible for the store's location. We appreciate you bringing this to our attention.  Leesa

name: BJ Winston
text: This store needs more workers and ones who actually service all customers and not those of their same skin tone. Waited an hour for assistance. Found what I needed but no one was around to help except for the guy who went from the the counter to every other customer except me. Ordered the product online, finally ask for help again only to be told that the display could not be sold.

name: Shawna L.
text: Five Stars to Tech Services Rep *Will*. He was extremely patient in helping me with issues with my desktop (White Dell AIO). His advise, skillset and overall mannerism was the epitome of customer service. Thank you Will !

name: Ashley Wright
text: Went into store to buy two computer chairs for our household. We found the ones that we wanted at the price point we wanted. No one seemed to be available to help us, so we had to load them up ourselves. Once reaching the register, the chairs rang up $100+ higher than the signage. Even after verifying the price tag did indeed show the lower price, we were (rudely) told that since the sale had ended (6 days earlier, btw), they would not honor their price tags. Either update your signage when the sale ends, or learn something about customer service and own up to your mistakes. I've worked in retail before, and this is not how you treat customers.

resp.text: Hi Ashley, Thank you for bringing this Customer service issue to our attention. I am so sorry for the negative experience you recently had at our store. I would like to send your comments to the appropriate team, so that this can be addressed properly. They will want to contact you for additional details. Kindly send us an email to socialmedia.service@officedepot.com. Please provide the store # in the subject line along with your contact information and these details. We are here to help! -Emma

name: Brandi Westrom
text: I ordered a printer to be delivered.  Shipping confirmation stated that I would receive the printer on 8/10/20.  I received another shipping communication after the printer was not delivered stating that the printer was not on the truck but delivery would be attempted again.  I contacted customer service and found out that I would have to reorder the printer to actually get it.  The email said nothing about needing to reorder!!!!   It is no wonder Amazon is doing so well.

resp.text:
Hi Brandi:

Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback. I am so sorry to hear we let you down. This is not the experience we want for our customers. We will research this immediately.

Would you please be so kind to send an email to socialmedia.service@officedepot.com with your best contact email and phone number? Please include the store #2564 and the order # in the subject line since this is more of a order issue.

We are here to help!

Chloe :)

name: Carl Esch
text: I gave a 5, STAR review on this sight. HOW EVER this time when we went to pick up our new batch of Business Cards for our Band, they was not as well made as the original was. I gave the Lady at the desk one of out old cards told her to duplicate it. She said Very well. We ordered two boxes. When I picked them up they was off centered to the Left cutting My wife's right shoulder and part of her hat off. The lettering was so darn small and light colored we could see it with a magnifier glass. But when you hand a card to a Potential Client, you want them to be able to read it easily. If they have to strain they will chunk it. I cut the rating down to a 3 star. If it is no better I will cut it out all to gather. They have always been good there is why we went back.

name: kevin nguyen
text: I went here to get my business gift certificate done. i gave them a copy of my old gift certificate and tell them that how i want, when i pick up and take it home until my boss take a look, he was so up set how poor and ugly it look, I regret that I didn’t look before take it home. I never come here again, staple is the best place to go

resp.text: Hi Kevin, Thank you for bringing this Customer service issue to our attention. I am so sorry for the negative experience you recently had at our store. I would like to send your comments to the appropriate team, so that this can be addressed properly. They will want to contact you for additional details. Kindly send us an email to socialmedia.service@officedepot.com. Please provide the store # in the subject line along with your contact information. We are here to help!   Emma

name: Dokter Xomby
text: If I could rate zero stars, I would. Ordered a computer for curbside pickup, they assured me on the website and when called they had one in stock, but they didnt even have one. I drove from an hour away to be told they dont know what I'm talking about. I spent $566.74 and $10 in gas to be turned right back around. They were rude and kept avoiding me because it was 30 minutes before closing time. Now I have to wait 3 days to be refunded my money. I will never be doing business at this store again. Better off going to your local Goodwill or Walmart for a computer than this Office Depot. Horrible experience!

name: Amy Gilmer
text: It's an older store, but it's well organized and clean. Employees were all friendly and helpful. I did an online print order and one item was wrong. The employee at the print center fixed it immediately and everything turned out great.

name: Amber Puckett
text: I love shopping at this store. I do a lot of personal and business transactions at this store. The staff always makes me feel at home and part of the family.

name: Donna Stamper
text: I appreciate the Office Depot staff walking 20 feet to the ink section to retrieve the single black cartridge I ordered online. Apparently, the online ordering process is only convenient if the item you're ordering is not actually in the store and you need it to be.  Otherwise, you will spend just as much time, if not longer, standing at the online pickup counter trying to pick up the item you searched and already paid for online.  Office Depot scanned my driver license (I had already clarified that I personally would pick up the order, as the online form asks). I was asked twice if I wanted a receipt, once by the computer then by the rep (the receipt already came to my email,  along with the $ withdrawn from my account when I placed the order).  I had to sign the credit card panel.  Honestly, I don't have to do all that when I order $200 worth of groceries online for pickup at Walmart.  Office Depot--please make your online ordering more efficient.  Isn't that the point of ordering online--efficiency and convenience?

name: CC
text: I ordered a poster print at 11:47 am because I needed for a trip I'm taking tomorrow and they claim to provide same day service. They said it would be ready by 7 pm. That gave them 7+ hours to have it done. When I came to pick it up 7pm, the guy behind the counter said, "Yeah, I haven't even started it yet." No apology. When I got upset he asked when I needed it. I said, now. You had 7+ hours to get it ready! I won't being doing any business here again!

resp.text:
Colleen, , I am sorry to learn that you were disappointed with the service you received during a recent visit to your local Office Depot store.  When you enter one of our stores you are our guest, and as such are entitled to be greeted by knowledgeable employees who are willing and eager to assist you.  From your comments, it appears that this is not the level of service that you received, and we regret disappointing you.
""If you would like I can place a note for someone to contact you back after they receive the complaint, would this be okay?" If you would reply back to SocialMedia.Service@OfficeDepot.com . Please enter the store#2645 in the subject line.  Thanks  Shirley!

name: S.Hazen Guthrie
text:
I have had two copying crises.  Not a normal Office Depot customer, I followed a suggestion to try  a particular Office Depot store in my city:  University Drive, Huntsville Alabama.

Customer service by the copy specialist, Katie, was just amazing.  There was no job too unusual, time limit too constraining.  She was creative, competent, and fast.  The second occasion, I was helped by the manager, Gary.  He set me up with the copy center.  Once again creativity, confidence, and service.

As an individual businessperson, my crazy schedule and over-full priority list were made so much easier today.

Thank you!!!

name: Paulette Risher
text:
Yesterday, I purchased a 27" Samsung Computer Monitor.  I installed it and was extremely unhappy with the quality of the color and resolution.

Only then did I go back and read the reviews on the Office Depot website and found that I wasn't alone in my negative assessment.  I called the store and the customer service manager could not have been more accommodating.  There was no whining or critique.  He simply told me to bring it back and they would give me a refund or trade it for another monitor.  This morning I took it back in and the man that helped me could not have been more helpful.  I bought a Dell (one with great reviews).

This is a true example of what excellent customer service looks like.  Thank you!!!

name: Justin Mullen
text: Very disappointing customer service. Came in to pick up extra  mechanical pencils and note cards while in the area and went to the check out.  No one was running the registers, but three employees were behind customer service (2 high school/early college age male and female, as well as a older female)  The two young employees were actively engaged in a conversation, one makes eye contact while the other has back turned but continues with conversation.  The older female notices me as well and has to tell the younger female with her back 4 times to return to her register.  She goes to register, doesn't greet me or ask if I found everything alright.  Instead only asks if I want to sign up for a membership a few times after I decline repeatedly.  She puts my order in the bag and walks off before I can take my card out of the chip reader and back into my wallet.  Didn't even get a thank you for shopping.  Will not return again since staff doesn't want to make their customers feel welcomed or care if they make the sell. Will just order supplies from Amazon in advance, or go to Walmart in a pinch.  At least then I can use self check out.

name: Gwen Thomas
text:
I go to the copy department to get a couple of sheets enlarged. It will be ready in 10 minutes the employee says. I leave and come back in 30 minutes. There is a new lady behind the counter now!! Asking me all kids of questions because the first employee didn't do her job.
So frustrating!! So now I still have to wait.

name: Mattea Matthews
text: Placed an online print order and called to see if it really was going to be ready at 7pm or if I could get it earlier. When I got transferred to their department the girl answered "Printing" I told her about my order and was told "If it said 7pm then it will be ready at 7pm"  then she asked if that was all I needed because she was busy. If ya hate your job that much go find a new one. If management reads this (I really hope you do) if your staff is too overworked and can't keep up with orders than put more staff on and if not then talk to them about customer service. I wont be ordering here again.

name: john morton
text: Friendly staff. Nice set up of products.

name: James Burton
text:
Always available to help. (5 star)

Update Dec 2016 (dropping to 2 star): went by on a Saturday and they were closed by 6:30 even though their sign says they're open till 9. The agent on the phone kept insisting their hours were listed as until 6, and i think he was only satisfied when I read him the hours sign that they really were listed as open until 9.

Update Jan 2017 (dropping to 1 star): I contacted the company about the incident above, and they forwarded my message to the local manager but I have not heard anything after several days. Seems like they should want to fix this. . .

name: Joseph Chandler
text: This is the 2nd time over the years we've bought a new computer from this Office Depot. They actually have really good prices a wide selection of computers both online and in store, and they are friendly and don't push anything you don't need.

name: A Shirey
text: Awesome customer service... Oh did I mention their backpacks are 60% off - don't forget to check out all the Office Furniture upon ur visit and ask for Apollo Furniture assembly service

name: Dark Hatter
text: Miss Talitha, who works in the copy/print section is amazing.  She is extremely helpful and goes out of her way to help how she can. Someone please PROMOTE her!

name: Constance Tiller
text: Always friendly service. I found some great deals today!

name: youknowit158
text: Walked in to look at chairs for a home office. Now it had been open for 2 hours by the time I walked in, and there was trash all over the floor looks like they haven't clean that place in months. And with the horrible lighting of the place and garbage all over the floor and when I mean garbage I mean candy wrappers pieces of plastic receipts and random other things of trash this place just seemed disgusting in the lack of acknowledging my existence by the employees this place gets one star because there's no option for zero Stars. Myself and one other person were the only customers in the entire store literally the employees had us out number 2 to 1. And no one could even say welcome or even clean that place very lazy employees from what I've seen. I can safely say I will never go back to that place.

name: Emilee Vinton
text: Literally the WORST place EVER! Drive AWAY Drive Away FAST! Go anywhere else! I don’t even know why I keep coming back. Every time I go there to get print work done, they forget about my order and when I go to pick it up they never know what I’m talking about. I even go in an place my order in person every time and they still manage to not do their job! It’s ridiculous and then they expect you to pay full price for a huge inconvenience!!! I needed invites printed out recently and needed to mail them on a certain day. I told the lady she was like sure no problem. It will be ready at such and such time. Keep in mind I have a toddler in which it’s hard enough to make time to run errands. I go in with my toddler to pick up my order and I’m actually an hour later than what she told me because I figured they could use the extra hour.  Well when I get there, they had no idea what I was talking about and said the lady never put my order in. My stuff that I wrote down for her along with my usb drive is missing too. My toddler isn’t happy at this point and neither am I! Finally they find it and he said oh yea it’s not done sorry. I can have it done in like a few hours..... I was like well that’s not very helpful bc I needed them mailed today and he said yes I’m sorry. Okay well do you expect me to pay full price bc I sure as heck am not!!!!! Like don’t go here if you want things done right! This is seriously the worst place to go! I wouldn’t even give them a 1

name: John Belt
text: The really tall skinny guy was very helpful and very friendly. I'm sorry I don't know his name.

name: Ashley Fountaine
text: I found the other Office Depot location (at around Drake and Memorial) to be more helpful. The University location had my item "in stock" but they couldn't locate them. They had it marked on sale and it wasn't, according to the manager. So, I visited the other location and they honored the sale even though this location is the one that messed up and left their sign up.

name: Rosemary Davidson
text: Great customer service. They scan my documents for me, and had some great clearance items for the Teachers.

name: Jessica Polk
text: Awsome customer service. Store was very organized. Staff was more than willing to help.

name: Lynn Howze
text: Great customer service. Keep up the good work

name: Deborah Lee
text: I purchased PC, modem, etc. Gary was a terrific rep to work with. Very helpful and efficient.

name: Chantaine Rhoe-Bulluck
text: Great service, product s and prices! It's a triple win!

name: Cynthia Riddle
text: The staff was very friendly and helpful.

name: Lee Mills
text: The folks were nice but everything I needed was out of stock.

name: David Brewer
text: Friendly personnel and a great sale.

name: Kayci Williams
text: Called to get a quote to see how much a repair was. Got put on hold then they hung up.

name: Michael Pukish
text: I got help in the aisles from a salesperson without having to ask, and that's everything these days because it's so rare now.

name: Paul Tidd
text: They had everything we needed

name: Scott Smith
text: I can really had a hard time finding an Android USB mini charge cable everything you have it's for an iPhone right.

name: annette bramblett
text: Customer rep didn't know what steno pads were (showing my age lol), but we found them. Manager checked me out so there would be no waiting.

name: Robert Kemper
text: Lots of selection except in the telephone area. Couldn't find what I needed.

name: AnnMarie Martin
text: Great customer service!

name: Pat Stolz
text: Hard to find someone to help find an item and then only had one of something i was looking for, but the south store had 5 in stock.

name: Arthur Arthur
text: Customer service by the Computers specialist, Stefan, was just wonderful.

name: Sabrina Faer
text: Great service!

name: AnnMarie Martin
text: Great customer service!

name: Arthur Arthur
text: Customer service by the Computers specialist, Stefan, was just wonderful.

name: Tom Windsor
text: Keith and his staff are top notch. Outstanding customer service. No need to look anywhere else for all of your printing and shipping needs. They even have a convenient notary public service that I have personally used. Keep up the great work!

name: P F (Passiflora)
text: They are a great local business-copied my blueprints with skill and courtesy. When first set was too light they repeated until I was satisfied. Work was done quickly and efficiently while I waited. Cost was reasonable also.

resp.text: Thank you, PF, for your kind words.  We work hard to make sure our customers are satisfied with both the product and service they receive at our store.  Your experience is a testimony to the excellent employees we have - we hope to see you again in the near future.  Keith

name: Mary Sue Fortner
text: I received a package ordered from Amazon that was open and only 1 item in it when I had ordered 2. It was Closys mouthwash. The UPS store was not responsible for this.  They’re store is only for drop offs.  They are very kind and helpful.

resp.text: Hi Ms. Fortner.  Please contact my store to discuss your package.  Was it delivered direct to your home by UPS or was it picked up at my store?  We will be happy to get you to the right people to discuss.  205-980-8180, Keith

name: Melissa Dixon
text: Keith Sides and his employees are fantastic. I use them for all of my mailing needs, fingerprinting, and greeting card purchases. I'm always greeted by a smiling face, and the services is worth more than five stars.

name: JohnnyBee Goode
text: Had the pleasure of spending almost one hpur speaking with Keith, the Owner of this UPS Store tonight. I arrived as the clock struck 6:30 pm (Closing Time) to pick up some print media for our Bakery, as someone outsourced our Order and I had no idea what to expect re: the finished product. Mr. Sides was laid back, personable and our product looks fantastic. He not only won my business moving forward but I will be using Keith and this (specific) UPS Store (although it is a good 20-25 minutes outside of the way) in the future for custom orders relative to our Brand. A+

name: Lavon Chaney
text: I had a commissioned painting I needed shipped to my sister in NC.  The crew at Caldwell Mill UPS Store took great care in packaging the painting and it arrived in tact and exactly on time.  The little extra it may cost to ship ANYTHING via UPS vs. the US Postal system is totally worth it.  Highly recommend this store!!

name: Cameron McKinley
text: This is my favorite UPS Store and I will drive out of my way to go here because of the great customer service. Zared, the front counter manager, is amazing. She is efficient, friendly, knowledgeable, and a problem-solver. I am always in and out quickly and everything ships as planned. Thank you for your commitment to the community!

resp.text: Cameron....thank you very much for your kind review and for being a loyal customer.  We try to make sure every customer feels unique and that we always provide excellent service.  Zared, and the rest of her team at the front counter, work hard and do an awesome job!  Keith

name: Shawn Troughton
text:
Love Keith and everyone at this UPS Location. There is no better place to go.
We use them to ship and print for our business as well as personal use.

name: RRozsa
text: I love this place.  They are friendly, helpful, and efficient!  Mailing a package is never a hassle, and ithe store is in a very convenient location -- easy to get in and out of quickly.

name: Andy Entrekin
text: Friendly and knowledgeable staff. They took care of me!

name: Leslie Cremer
text: The best place to go for shipping needs!  The people here are always nice and willing to help. If I ever got to the point where I lived farther away I would drive all that way to get there.

resp.text: Leslie...I apologize for the late response but we certainly appreciate your vote of confidence.  Our counter staff works hard to provide excellent service each and every day.  Please, if you ever do move further away, always come back to see us.  Keith

name: Ella Fulcher
text: I had some plates that got shattered during shipment and a package that got labeled wrong.  I called the store and spoke with Zared who looked into my shipment and helped me return the wrong package and is working on getting me refunded for the plates.  Zared has been super helpful and sweet as we work through getting things processed and together.

resp.text: Ella....Thank you for your kind words about the service provided by Zared.  She and all our staff have the goal of providing the best in customer service.  While accidents do happen, we are always ready and willing to do whatever it takes to make it right.

name: Glenn Mazer
text: I could not submit another review so I'm editing a previous one to respond to Gabriel's review left a few days ago because it is not indicative of the UPS Store, the staff, or it's owner. She writes, "What good is the UPS store if I can’t ship postal packages.. just one more inconvenience because people can’t do their jobs right!!!" This review needs to be directed to the USPS, not the UPS store, she named the wrong entity in her review. She is correct about people not doing their job because that's the very reason the UPS store stopped taking prepaid USPS packages, because the USPS can't do their job. They lose packages, packages are delayed because they can't do their job and the UPS store should not have to take the blame for the USPS inadequate culture. So guess what? They don't have to take any more of the blame because they can't provide an accommodation for a service that is so inept in which they get blamed for. I am in this store just about everyday to get my mail. Regardless of how busy the staff is, I’m always treated with, “hello Mr. Mazer.” Zared and her crew are the most dedicated, service oriented people I’ve ever encountered. They get bombarded with shipping and packaging around this time of year, but they don’t change their demeanor. Keith, the owner, is a great guy and it’s no wonder why he has great people working for him. It is because he knows how to treat people and how people want to be treated. For that person that upgraded her one star to three stars, shame on you for blaming these fine folks for your ignorance.

resp.text: Glenn....always a pleasure to see you and thank you for your kind words.  I am blessed with good people whose goal is always to help our customers whether it be shipping, printing or any other of our business services.  If ever we fail to live up to your expectations - let me know - we'll make it right!  Keith

name: Jennifer Henshaw
text: Devon is an amazing employee! She stayed late to help me out and is very quick with her job! I think that's how she spelled her name but didn't get a good look. 10/10 for her!

resp.text: Jennifer....Thank you for your kind comments regarding Devyn.  She, and all our staff, hope to provide the best in customer service.  We are here to be of help any time we can.

name: Bryan Kirkland
text: Victoria was very helpful and patient with my products that had to be shipped. It's not everyday a racing wheelchair with two sets of wheels are shipped but she handled it like a pro and beyond pleasant to talk to. She listened to what I explained to her about how to package the carbon fiber wheels so that they wouldn't  get damaged from the axel's touching one another. I was dreading the process but came out of it with a smile on my face.

name: Mary Waldman
text:
I was charged a $20 rush fee for a small photocopy print job I submitted the day before. When I questioned the charge, I was told that same day photocopying was considered a rush. I pointed out that I had submitted the job the day before - I'd called the shop to make sure the email had come through and the clerk said the copy shop had left early. The best the manager could do was a 15% discount on the rush fee. I asked where this policy was noted and the staff had to dig out a notebook page buried on a back counter (that didn't list the policy). I just checked the website and there's no mention of rush charges, or even print prices.
(Update: this review started as a 1-star but I have changed it to a 3-star based on the managers quick response and offer to ameliorate the situation.)

resp.text:
Good morning....thank you for your comments and I want to start off by apologizing for the confusion on the rush fee.  We had understood the items were needed by 4:30pm that day and, as such, a rush fee would normally apply for same day jobs handled by our print department.  My apologies that you did not receive a quote before we proceeded on the job which would have outlined all charges and requested your approval to proceed.

Because of our error and because we value each customer’s business and their satisfaction with our work, I want to offer a cash refund to you for the rush fee or a print credit to be used on a future job.  We hope to see you again and trust you will find our service level improved.

Keith Sides

name: Jamie White
text: Keith at the UPS store on Caldwell Mill Road does a terrific job! His employees are always friendly and fast. I would recommend you use THIS UPS store for all of your printing needs.

name: Daniel Gallegly
text:
Keith grew a beard. I thought he was in the witness protection program when I ran into him. But he looks sharp and distinguished with the new look.

He has a great local print and ship shop that always did a good job for us and their people behind the counter have great attitudes and are really helpful and nice.

Good turn around and design quality always looks good. Keith runs a tight ship even with a beard.

name: Johnny Carcioppolo
text: This is the place to go for your printing needs!!! Colby and Donna did an amazing job for me in a pinch. The price was right and the service was outstanding. If you have printing needs and you want reliable, cost efficient, professional and friendly service this is where you need to go. I will certainly have them do much more of my printing now.

text: Rude!  Just looked at me when I came in. No can I help you are anything.  We just stood looking as each other. Rude. Bad customer service.

text: Very professional and quality service.

name: Georgia S
text: Always SUPER nice and EXTREMELY helpful!

name: Jeff Peterson
text:
If you're looking for honest service and a helpful staff - GO ELSEWHERE.

After a relative passed away, I packaged and shipped five boxes to our home across the country.  We told the employee that we wanted the most economical option - the contents were valuable and needed insurance (china, books, birdhouse, rug, etc.), but speed was not a concern.  We were told 3 day residential was the cheapest option.

One of the five boxes was completely crushed during shipment and several china pieces were broken despite purchasing nearly $100 of bubble wrap and china specific packaging supplies.  I filed a claim with UPS, provided pictures, etc.  Without inspecting the box, UPS ultimately denied the claim because there was a sweater in the package that I'd sent in the box to free up room for stuff in my luggage.  UPS claimed it was inappropriate packaging material even though it was just part of the contents.  UPS would not discuss the denial with me because UPS deemed the UPS Store as the shipper (not me).

During the claims process, I found out that ground service was available and would have been ~$200 less expensive.

I called the UPS store and spoke to the manager.  I started by telling her about the insurance denial.  She said it was not their issue since they didn't package the box.  I agreed, but told her UPS will only speak with them (as the shipper) and that they needed to act on my behalf to help resolve the issue.  I next mentioned that we could have shipped the boxes via ground for less money and that staff misled us.  She became INCREDIBLY RUDE and told me the staff just recommended that service - not that it wasn't the cheapest option.  I pushed back and asked if she was present at the time of the transaction - she said no.  With no knowledge of the interaction, she continued to blindly and aggressively tell me what her staff said and did.  It was clear the conversation was going nowhere.

A manager from a different location called later.  She said they'd file an appeal with UPS on our behalf.  No followup occurred.

I rarely get fired up, but this experience was AWFUL!  The staff misled and overcharged us.  UPS denied a claim without ever inspecting the box.  UPS would not speak to me despite my family boxing, shipping, paying for and receiving the boxes.  The manager was incredibly rude.  They were unhelpful and failed to help resolve the claim with UPS.

This is a great store if this is the service you're looking for.

To make it even worse, as I was filing the dispute with UPS (which took hours and multiple calls), I contacted the UPS Store to get copies of our receipt.  They were helpful and said they'd send over the receipts.  Instead of sending our receipt, they accidentally emailed me a copy of another customer's DRIVERS LICENSE and SOCIAL SECURITY CARD.  I guess you can add careless to the list too.....

FIND ANOTHER WAY/LOCATION TO SHIP YOUR UPS PACKAGES!

name: Ben Brady
text: rude Cheryl going to fedex

resp.text: Hi, and thank you for visiting our store. We apologize if you had a bad experience in our store. We invite you back to further discuss what happened and to see what actions need to be taken. Maybe there was just a misunderstanding. Please contact us at your earliest convenience.

name: Don Hembree
text: Worst UPS service center experience I’ve ever had. Went in for a simple drop off of a Verizon phone return using the Verizon provided box and shipping label and the owner/attendant  require that I buy a new box from him before shipping. Took to another UPS location and dropped off with no problem.  This is obviously a scam

resp.text: We apologize about your experience in our store. We do invite you back in to better address the situation. Policy states that USPS packaging are for USPS shipping only depending on their service, UPS Express packaging is for UPS Express Services only, and FedEx packaging is for FedEx services only. Thank you!

name: Nicole Smith
text: Went in to this location today at 5:30pm because I needed to give my fingerprints for some documents, when I went in a blonde haired lady with her hair pulled in a high bun who wore glasses  asked what I needed and I told her I needed to give my fingerprints, she then proceeded to tell me they quit doing prints at 5 which is not a big deal I would have came back tomorrow, I was curious as to why they quit taking fingerprints at 5 so I asked the lady, she then said “because we do!” I thought I misinterpreted what she said so I said “I’m sorry did you say because we do” her reply was yup. I asked the lady to speak to a manager she said there wasn’t one there so I asked her name and she stated Cheryl. I was in such shock that she was that rude, I will be contacting management or higher up in the morning! That is just no way to treat customers and is highly upsetting that someone who works with the public doesn’t know how to deal with the public. Terrible customer service!!!!!

resp.text: We do apologize for the way our employee has treated you on your last visit. The real reason we stop doing fingerprints after 5pm is because we try to have two or more employees on the floor, one to assist our fingerprint customers when they come in and one to handle other customers with their needs. We do invite you to come back in to talk with us about redeeming this experience. Thank you!

name: Scotty Stimpson
text: I come to this location all the time to return my Amazon orders. The staff is always professional and the returns go smoothly! Will continue coming!

resp.text: Thank you for your continued patronage!

text: Best of all in the area!!!

resp.text: Thank you for this review!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your visit! We look forward to seeing you again.

The employee was unwilling to do anything about it because I "packaged the box myself." Can't believe they would treat costumers' packages so poorly and offer nothing to fix the problem. Waste of money and time to use this store.

text: Horrible customer service. Never going here again. The "manager" was rude and tried to make me feel incompetent. She was condescending and really didn't care to help me. Only concerned with hurrying me out the door to "assist" the next customer. The other woman was nice and pleasant though.

name: AWAKEN Student Ministries
text: Great Customer service, always friendly and willing to Go the extra mile!!!

name: Harmony Love
text:
The African American manager was very rude and unfriendly to his employees and to the customers!

I return packages all the time to Amazon and I never pay a dime.

This representative made me pay $12 for PACKAGING!!!

resp.text:
I would first like to apologize if I came off abrasive or seemed short with anyone. That was not my intention. There were several factors at play and maybe my directness was not well received.
Unfortunately, your Amazon return was not covered for The UPS Store to pack and ship. Yes, Amazon covered your shipping, but they did not cover your packaging. Not all Amazon returns are free returns. Not all Amazon returns are covered for The UPS Store to pack and ship. A shipping label only covers shipping costs. It does not cover packaging. Also, I did not make you pay for packaging. I said if you wish for us to package your return, then it was going to be $12. I do invite you back to our location for a more personal apology and to possibly review this incident to come to a better understanding.

name: Kelley Anderson
text: I had prompt, friendly, competent service. Sign on the door says under new management; that might explain the poor reviews from earlier.

I will not use them ever again and I will go to FEDEX for future service.   Poor, Poor Customer Service and I would not recommend them for future service.
